item.title: How to Retrieve Motivation
item.author: Author
item.description: Today I watched a video by a psychotherapist on how to overcome the negative emotions like depression, discouragement while chasing your goals, which I found very helpful.

item.title: Adding Lenovo Printer to Raspberry Pi (or Other Linux Computers)
item.author: Author
item.description: I figured out how to extract the PPD file from Lenovo printer driver and connect it to my Raspberry Pi.

item.title: How to Noise-Free your HDD from an Old Computer?
item.author: Author
item.description: Recently, I came up with a brilliant idea to remove the noise from the HDD in my old PC.
